title: Halloween Lettering/Type
content: A friend showed me a postcard [announcing this event.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417201202/http:/www.expowest.com/ew09/public/enter.aspx) Not only is a bunch of the graphics set in Reliq, but the main logo/graphic is a photo of a pumpkin carved with the event name, in Reliq. Sweet and spooky.
author: crossgrove
